ripenessIndicators.unripe: Firm texture, bright green or light red color
ripenessIndicators.ripe: Firm but slightly yielding texture, bright red or yellow color
ripenessIndicators.overripe: Softer texture, deeper color, slight bruising may appear
ripenessIndicators.spoiled: Very soft texture, browning, visible mold or rot

storageRecommendations.unripe: Room temperature away from direct sunlight
storageRecommendations.overripe: Use immediately or refrigerate for 1-2 days

ripenessIndicators.unripe: Firm, pale yellow or greenish color
ripenessIndicators.ripe: Soft but not mushy, golden-orange color
ripenessIndicators.overripe: Very soft, dark orange color, possibly browning
ripenessIndicators.spoiled: Mushy texture, brown coloration, mold present

storageRecommendations.overripe: Use immediately or freeze for smoothies

ripenessIndicators.unripe: Hard texture, bright green skin
ripenessIndicators.ripe: Yields to gentle pressure, dark green to black skin
ripenessIndicators.overripe: Very soft, possibly dented skin
ripenessIndicators.spoiled: Extremely mushy, brown flesh, mold present

ripenessIndicators.unripe: Green color, firm texture
ripenessIndicators.ripe: Yellow color with small brown spots, slightly soft
ripenessIndicators.overripe: Yellow with many brown spots, soft texture
ripenessIndicators.spoiled: Mostly brown or black, mushy texture

storageRecommendations.unripe: Room temperature away from other fruit
storageRecommendations.spoiled: Discard or use in baking if no mold present

ripenessIndicators.unripe: Small size, reddish or pink color
ripenessIndicators.ripe: Plump, deep blue color with slight dusty appearance
ripenessIndicators.overripe: Very soft, leaking juice, wrinkled appearance
ripenessIndicators.spoiled: Moldy, mushy texture, fermented smell

storageRecommendations.overripe: Use immediately or freeze for smoothies

ripenessIndicators.unripe: Small size, light red or pinkish color, firm texture
ripenessIndicators.ripe: Deep red color, plump, slightly firm
ripenessIndicators.overripe: Very dark red, soft texture, wrinkled skin
ripenessIndicators.spoiled: Moldy, extremely soft, leaking juice

ripenessIndicators.unripe: Green outer husk, clear liquid inside
ripenessIndicators.ripe: Brown fibrous husk, firm white flesh, sweet liquid
ripenessIndicators.overripe: Brown husk, slightly yellow flesh, less liquid
ripenessIndicators.spoiled: Cracked or moldy husk, sour smell, discolored flesh

storageRecommendations.unripe: Room temperature for drinking the water
storageRecommendations.ripe: Room temperature for up to 2 weeks, refrigerate opened coconut

ripenessIndicators.ripe: Full size, deep color (green, red, or purple), slightly firm

ripenessIndicators.ripe: Yields to gentle pressure, sweet-tart taste
ripenessIndicators.overripe: Very soft, wrinkled skin
ripenessIndicators.spoiled: Extremely soft, moldy, fermented smell

ripenessIndicators.ripe: Bright yellow color, slight give when pressed
ripenessIndicators.overripe: Dull yellow color, soft spots, wrinkled skin
